bio: I'm Anirudh Batra, a sales strategist turned tech builder. With a background in global GTM strategies, I transitioned into development, focusing on AI-driven tools, automation, and SaaS solutions.

careerHighlights.title: Built My First MicroSaaS - A Sales Forecasting Tool
careerHighlights.description: Developed a full-stack AI-powered forecasting tool from scratch.

careerHighlights.title: Transitioned from Sales to Development
careerHighlights.description: Started coding, built AI bots & web apps, and documented my journey.

careerHighlights.title: Global GTM & Emerging Tech Sales
careerHighlights.description: Led international sales & business expansion for cutting-edge tech companies.
